name: 5:55 - Five Fifty-Five
description:
-STOP TIME: ELIMINATE ALL HOSTILES-

You have one goal as you stroll through the building, armed only with a considerable supply of knives: Leave no survivors. Weave in and out of danger using your all-powerful ability to stop time--trivializing enemies and their gunfire--and clear the building of hostiles as quickly as you can.

-CONTROLS -

WASD - Movement 

Esc (hold) - Back to main Menu 

Mouse 1/LMB - Stop Time/Throw Knife

--

Moving all my old projects from Gamejolt to this page. This is one of my proudest creations.

Original Description:

Inspired by both SUPERHOT and JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, 5:55 is a short, action-arcade game I developed mainly as a proof of concept. I'd love any feedback, and please let me know if you find any issues. Have fun!

Maybe there will be a successor one day.
